2019-garden-campus.title: A Garden Campus Mobile App
2019-garden-campus.body: Part of a 2-person team to develop a mobile app in React Native for the “Garden Campus” initiative. The app helped to document the school’s biodiversity and guide students on a biodiversity trail around campus. (http://hcgarden.hci.edu.sg/)

2019-open-house.title: Open House 2019 Mobile App
2019-open-house.body: Part of a 2-person team to develop a mobile app in React Native to provide visitors and prospective students with information about the school’s programmes and open house schedule. (https://infocommsociety.com/oha_page/)

2018-ecg-fair.title: Education and Career Guidance Fair 2018 Mobile App
2018-ecg-fair.body: Part of a 2-person team to develop a mobile app in React Native as a companion app for students to refer to university information and booths.

timetable-bot.title: Class Timetable Telegram Chatbot
timetable-bot.body: Self-learned and developed a Telegram bot in Python for use as a personal assistant in the class group chat to help my classmates manage their timetables and homework.
